Package pitt.search.lucene

Package containing some basic Lucene utilities for creating and searching indexes, including bilingual indexes and predication (triple) indexes.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FilePositionDoc
    This class makes a minor modification to org.apache.lucene.FileDocument such that it records TermPositionVectors for each document
    IndexBilingualFiles
    Index pairs of bilingual texts in a parallel corpus.
    IndexFilePositions
    Index all text files under a directory.
    LuceneIndexFromTriples
    This class takes as input a single text file with each line following the format \t\t
    LuceneSearch
    Simple standalone class for searching a lucene index.
    LuceneTokenizer  
    PorterAnalyzer  

Package pitt.search.lucene Description

Package containing some basic Lucene utilities for creating and searching indexes, including bilingual indexes and predication (triple) indexes.
Author:
Dominic Widdows, in collaboration with Kathleen Ferraro and the University of Pittsburgh.
